description: CloudWatch Logs: Added support for Live Tailing LogGroups. Start using LiveTail by: selecting 'Tail Log Group' in the command palette, or, right clicking/pressing the 'Play' icon on a Log Group in the Explorer menu. See [Troubleshoot with CloudWatch Logs Live Tail](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/logs/CloudWatchLogs_LiveTail.html) for more information. LiveTail is a paid feature - for more information about pricing, see the Logs tab at [Amazon CloudWatch Pricing](https://aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/pricing/).
